# Utils

> Standard library basic mathematical utilities.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var utils = require( '@stdlib/math/base/utils' );
```

#### utils

Standard library basic mathematical utilities.

```javascript
var o = utils;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

```
